name: Explore South Wales Pass (4 in 8 days)
description:
EXPLORE SOUTH WALES PASS Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for any 4 days in 8 days. It covers the whole of south Wales and extends as far north as Shrewsbury and eastwards to Gloucester. Buy this ticket online from the TfW website It is also valid on Traws Cymru bus services. 
      Bus travel and other discounted facilities are available on any day in the chosen period, even if that day is not selected for rail travel. The Dean Forest Railway and Gwili Railway may offer discounts, contact them for details.
